attributes.action: Spend money on Homes, Education & Welfare NOT on the High Speed 2
attributes.additional_details: What we ask is that you spend money not on the HS2 but on things that are needed more and sooner, on such as education, homes and on the welfare of the whole of the country, and these are only a few of the things that thing country needs and we need something to help our country now in 2013 and not in 2032
